name: KIVARA
description:
Many many years ago in a faraway land was a young man named Kivara. He was the guardian of his village. One day he hears a ghastly noise and decides to follow it, in case it was something dangerous. He comes across a cave that wasn't there before! As curious as he was, Kivara decides to jump into the cave and explore. But he was unaware of all the mysteries awaiting him.

Controls:

  • A, D: Move
  • W: Jump
  • Space: Attack

Notes:

I made 3 additional skins for Kivara as my favourite YouTubers.

Here's how to unlock them:

Jacksepticeye: Kill all the enemies in under 5 minutes. Final boss doesn't count.

Markiplier: Find and use the hidden shortcut

PewDiePie: Finish the game without taking the save crystal.

DISCLAIMER:

The skins are not representing the current appearance of the related YouTuber.

If you encounter any bugs please let me know so I can fix them :)
